text:
Coverage is general. There
are no specific exemptions for government employees at the federal, state, or
local levels or their political subdivisions. (See FOH 16a08 and 16a09 regarding
the applicability of CCPA to such employees).
html: Coverage is general. There are no specific exemptions for government employees at the federal, state, or local levels or their political subdivisions. (See FOH 16a08 and 16a09 regarding the applicability of CCPA to such employees).
